name: Rivers 3 Multiple Choice Quiz | Rivers | 10 Questions

questions.text: What river is at the bottom of the Grand Canyon?
questions.explanation:
Colorado.

	The Colorado flows through seven states.

questions.text: What large river runs more or less from west to east through the Dakotas?
questions.explanation:
Missouri.

	It is the longest Mississippi River tributary. It does run south a little.

questions.text: In what country is the Murray River?
questions.explanation:
Australia.

	The Murray, Australia's principal river, rises in the Australian Alps, in southeastern New South Wales. It forms most of the border between New South Wales and Victoria.

Rhine.

	Strasbourg is a city in eastern France.

questions.text: What is the world's muddiest major river?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	It is China's second largest river.It picks up and carries yellow silt giving it the muddy look.

questions.text: The Ganges River empties into what body of water?
questions.explanation:
Bay of Bengal.

	It is the most sacred river of the Hindus.

questions.text: On what river would you find Hamburg?
questions.explanation:
Elbe.

	It is also called the Labe.

Rhine.

	It rises in Switzerland. It is the most important commercial inland waterway in the world.

Mackenzie.

	It rises in the Great Slave Lake and flows northwest to the Beaufort Sea.
